about_the_game:
Fear Of Mine - A Thrilling Visual Novel Adventure

Setting is in Anti-utopia cyberpunk world, 2040.

Embark on a heart-pounding journey through the anomalous mine of the future in this visual novel. With 10 chapters planned, one of which is already available, this mysterious and unexpected story will keep you on the edge of your seat.

In the year 2040, the mining industry is in crisis due to a shortage of tools. But one cutting-edge company, X-Company, has developed advanced nano-tools to meet the demands of the industry. You'll play as one of the miners of the future, tasked with working in a mine where ominous experiments were once conducted. The past horrors of the mine still linger, and the scientists who conducted the experiments have long since become monsters themselves. But even they couldn't have predicted the terror that would be unleashed when they opened Pandora's box.

Here's what you can expect from Fear Of Mine:

✔ Interactive story
✔ An unexpected and intriguing plot
✔ An original universe, ripe for expansion
✔ A hauntingly beautiful original soundtrack
✔ Plot twists that will leave you breathless

The visual novel adapts a story that was once featured on YouTube and now it's time for you to experience it in a new and thrilling way. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience fear like never before.

Experience the horror and tension of the anomalous mine for yourself in Fear Of Mine.

short_description: Fear of Mine - a visual novel in the genre of adventure and horror. An alien mushroom creature has brought you under his influence, and now it seems to take over the whole world. Can you escape its grasp? Can you survive? Can you at least save others from falling prey to the same fate as yours?
